Hero.title: — we care about your child's future
Hero.text: Our experienced teachers make the learning process as engaging and effective as possible for your child

About.title: To provide quality education and meaningful time, we divide children into small and comfortable groups based on age and learning level. Individual approach to each child. Up to 10 students per class. In-depth English teaching. We also send your children abroad for language practice. Education from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM; 3 balanced meals (optional), homework assistance. Everything for convenience!

user1.title: 3 meals a day
user1.text: We provide three delicious and healthy meals daily for a comfortable experience at school

user2.title: IT technologies
user2.text: The 21st century is the era of information technology. Your child will learn programming basics, gadget trends, and future careers

user3.title: Mental arithmetic
user3.text: We teach children to quickly perform complex math calculations in their heads

users4.title: English speaking
users4.text: We organize full-day English Speaking Days to help your child communicate freely in English

user5.title: Foreign languages
user5.text: Qualified teachers will teach your children English, Russian, Arabic, and Chinese

sinf1.title: Grade 1
sinf1.info: Handwriting, speech therapy, English etiquette, English speaking, general subjects, and sports activities

sinf2.title: Grade 2
sinf2.info: English level 1, Chinese, arithmetic, logical thinking, general subjects, and sports activities

sinf3.title: Grade 3
sinf3.info: English level 2, Arabic, psychology, mental arithmetic, IT technologies, general subjects, and sports

sinf4.title: Grade 4
sinf4.info: English level 3, French and German, IT technologies, general subjects, and sports activities

sinf5.title: Preschool
sinf5.info: Math, logic, writing, drawing, IT technologies, robotics, gymnastics, taekwondo

Kontaktlar.manzil: Tashkent city, Chilanzar, block 16, Botirma street

Komentlar.text: We offer a 20% discount in honor of our school's opening
